title: Near Set of Mecca T201s For Sale (43 of 50) - Almost All Graded
author: canjond

posts.post_title: Near Set of Mecca T201s For Sale (43 of 50) - Almost All Graded
posts.post_content:

The set is MISSING the following cards:

3Harry Baker / Thomas Downie
8Roy Hartzell / Walter Blair
11Mordecai Brown / Arthur Hoffman
14Harold Chase / Edward Sweeney
23Harry Lord / P.H. Dougherty

As you can see above, almost all major star cards are accounted for including Cobb, Mathewson, Johnson, Lajoie, Jennings, Evers, Baker, Bender, Collins, etc.

Asking $2850.00 including shipping and insurance.  Please feel free to ask for any specific scans.

Ted,

Hope all is well buddy.  Apologies but I never received your email.  Didn't want you to think I was ignoring them, but to be quite honest, I'm unsure what you asked.

Also, tried to shoot you a private message on here but it says you've exceeded your storage capabilities.

Kind regards,
Jon

Jon

I guess the Net54 link...."send email to canjond" doesn't always work.

TED Z
